stack_services.name: AMBARI_METRICS
stack_services.comment: A system for metrics collection that provides storage and retrieval capability for metrics collected from the cluster

stack_services.name: SPARK
stack_services.comment: Apache Spark is a fast and general engine for large-scale data processing.

stack_services.name: ATLAS
stack_services.comment: Atlas Metadata and Governance platform

stack_services.name: OOZIE
stack_services.comment: System for workflow coordination and execution of Apache Hadoop jobs. This also includes the installation of the optional Oozie Web Console which relies on and will install the ExtJS Library.

stack_services.name: RANGER
stack_services.comment: Comprehensive security for Hadoop

stack_services.name: TEZ
stack_services.comment: Tez is the next generation Hadoop Query Processing framework written on top of YARN.

stack_services.name: HIVE
stack_services.comment: Data warehouse system for ad-hoc queries & analysis of large datasets and table & storage management service

stack_services.name: ZEPPELIN
stack_services.comment:
A web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics. It enables you to
        make beautiful data-driven, interactive and collaborative documents with SQL, Scala
        and more.

stack_services.name: KAFKA
stack_services.comment: A high-throughput distributed messaging system

stack_services.name: SLIDER
stack_services.comment: A framework for deploying, managing and monitoring existing distributed applications on YARN.

stack_services.name: ACCUMULO
stack_services.comment: Robust, scalable, high performance distributed key/value store.

stack_services.name: KERBEROS
stack_services.comment:
A computer network authentication protocol which works on
        the basis of 'tickets' to allow nodes communicating over a
        non-secure network to prove their identity to one another in a
        secure manner.

stack_services.name: HBASE
stack_services.comment: A Non-relational distributed database, plus Phoenix, a high performance SQL layer for low latency applications.

stack_services.name: SQOOP
stack_services.comment:
Tool for transferring bulk data between Apache Hadoop and
        structured data stores such as relational databases

stack_services.name: KNOX
stack_services.comment: Provides a single point of authentication and access for Apache Hadoop services in a cluster

stack_services.name: ZOOKEEPER
stack_services.comment: Centralized service which provides highly reliable distributed coordination

stack_services.name: GANGLIA
stack_services.comment: Ganglia Metrics Collection system (RRDTool will be installed too)

stack_services.name: LOGSEARCH
stack_services.comment: Log aggregation, analysis, and visualization for Ambari managed services. This service is Technical Preview.

stack_services.name: RANGER_KMS
stack_services.comment: Key Management Server

stack_services.name: FLUME
stack_services.comment: A distributed service for collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of streaming data into HDFS

stack_services.name: SPARK2
stack_services.comment: Apache Spark is a fast and general engine for large-scale data processing

stack_services.name: MAPREDUCE2
stack_services.comment: Apache Hadoop NextGen MapReduce (YARN)

stack_services.name: AMBARI_INFRA
stack_services.comment: Core shared service used by Ambari managed components.

stack_services.name: STORM
stack_services.comment: Apache Hadoop Stream processing framework

stack_services.name: MAHOUT
stack_services.comment:
Project of the Apache Software Foundation to produce free implementations of distributed or
        otherwise scalable machine learning algorithms focused primarily in the areas of collaborative
        filtering, clustering and classification

stack_services.name: DRUID
stack_services.comment: A fast column-oriented distributed data store. This service is Technical Preview.

stack_services.name: PIG
stack_services.comment: Scripting platform for analyzing large datasets

stack_services.name: FALCON
stack_services.comment: Data management and processing platform

stack_services.name: HDFS
stack_services.comment: Apache Hadoop Distributed File System

stack_services.name: YARN
stack_services.comment: Apache Hadoop NextGen MapReduce (YARN)

stack_services.name: SMARTSENSE
stack_services.comment:
SmartSense - Hortonworks SmartSense Tool (HST) helps quickly gather configuration, metrics, logs from common HDP
                services that aids to quickly troubleshoot support cases and receive cluster-specific recommendations.
